page.title: 01Home Life
page.content: { }A Day In The Life Of Debbie Preston {____________________________________ At seven 'O' clock Mum and Dad's alarm clock wakes me up and Dad switches it off.Then I just lay in my bed until seven fifteen.I get out of bed and put my slippers on,pull my curtains back and go to the bathroom where I brush my teeth and wash my face and hands.Then I go back to my bedroom and put my clothes on .We don't have to wear school uniform we just wear what we want,however we're not allowed to wear trousers except in the winter but we're never allowed to wear jeans.When I have dressed I go to the dining-room.For my breakfast I have scrambled egg on toast.Mum makes the scrambled egg in the microwave oven,with eggs milk salt and pepper and sometimes tomato.I also have a drink of fresh orange juice.Then at }
